addPointPlayerOne() - Method in class application.main.Controller

application.dialog - package application.dialog
 
application.logic - package application.logic
 
application.main - package application.main
 
applyChanges() - Method in class application.dialog.ChangeNameController
Sets player name to content of the TextField and closes the Pop-Up upon pressing the Apply button
applyChanges() - Method in class application.dialog.OptionsController
Called upon pressing the Apply Button - Sets all options to their new values
applyChangesOnEnter(KeyEvent) - Method in class application.dialog.ChangeNameController
Sets player name to content of the TextField and closes the Pop-Up upon pressing the ENTER key in the TextField
